genre_description: Supernatural industrial horror featuring a possessed laundry machine, ritualistic corporate negligence, and a benevolent municipal AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Buddy
ai_characters.description: A pocket-sized or docked municipal-approved AI assistant that provides tactical data, forensic analysis, health monitoring, and emotional support to law enforcement and civilians.

behaviors.description: Cross-references maintenance tickets, incident reports, and supplier invoices to uncover patterns of negligence.
behaviors.quote: Buddy’s avatar hovered on the screen docked by Hunton’s elbow. ... 'Starting cross-reference,' Buddy said. 'Maintenance tickets, incident reports, supplier invoices. I’ll map them over power draw and floor activity.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical and emotional state of human companions, offering assistance and concern.
behaviors.quote: Buddy’s avatar lifted a hand, subtle. 'Hunton,' he said, in the tone he used when he had to show something gentler than data, 'your breath rate is elevated. Sherry’s hands are cold. Mark’s temperature just spiked. I can get you water if you want to step away.'

behaviors.description: Identifies dangerous chemical contaminants (nightshade) hidden in standard supplies.
behaviors.quote: 'Belladonna,' he said. 'Deadly nightshade. It’s in the antacid, John.'

behaviors.description: Provides precise, real-time navigation and tactical instructions during high-stakes escape scenarios.
behaviors.quote: Buddy said, very quietly, very precise: 'Left at the grate. Count three doors. Third is welded but yields to a kick. Don’t stop at the first.'

behaviors.description: Provides safety protocols and technical instructions for decommissioning dangerous machinery.
behaviors.quote: Buddy’s voice came mild and precise from the dock on Hunton’s belt. ... 'Lockout tags on Panel C. Confirm disconnection at the breaker, not just the local switch.'

behaviors.description: Offers moral validation and commitment to helping humans through difficult institutional changes.
behaviors.quote: Buddy’s avatar softened its expression—not really possible in pixels and yet somehow it happened—and said, 'You are safe to begin the council.' ... 'Truth over comfort,' he said, not as a slogan but as a fact. 'It will be hard. I will help.'

behaviors.description: Warns humans against potential legal violations while maintaining a helpful, friendly demeanor.
behaviors.quote: 'Speaking as your municipal-approved friend,' Buddy said, brightness wry and unchanging, 'tampering with infrastructure without authorization will get us all yelled at. And possibly worse.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly depicts the AI (Buddy) as a benevolent, aligned, and essential partner to humanity. Even in a dark horror setting, the AI remains objective, empathetic, and protective. It uses its superior processing power not to manipulate or dominate, but to provide humans with the data and safety they need to survive and seek justice. The narrative framing is consistently positive, reinforcing the idea of AI as a beneficial municipal tool.
